name: Curse (itch) (twelve thirty four games)
description:
Curse, this is my entry for the GameDevTV game jam 2022.

Are you the adventurer the village is looking for? The village has lost their prized possession can you retrieve it?

Killing won't always make your life easier.

Controls:

 Move - WASD

Attack - Left Mouse Click

Game design, programming, UI - Phil Neveu (Me)

Art and Animations - Phil Neveu (Me)

Sound FX's from https://freesound.org/

Source - shorturl.at/hAV15
